item.title: Ipfs Enabled
item.description: In episode 21 of The Self Hosted Podcast I talked about IPFS. Well if you are reading this then I did it. This website is now on IPFS and you if I did it right it looks no different than the regular website. Which I hope I got it right because that would be so cool. But I still dont like that whatever you put on IPFS it’s online forever. So you better be sure you stand behind what you say and dont change your mind.

item.title: Do I start another podcast?
item.description: I have to admit that I’m actually considering it You may have figured out by now that when I find something new the first thing I do is look for a podcast about it. I know I’m not the only one in the world that does this. But this time I’m not so sure about starting it. I want to do it but I dont want to, lol. I’m so indecisive.

item.title: Taking the Plunge on Full
item.description: Hubzilla hour 36 update Well it’s been just over 36 hrs I’ve been on Hubzilla and I really do still like it. Wait, I love it! I like it so much that I am considering take the full on plunge and going in up to my neck in it. I want to get into exeriencing the full effect with the webpages app and build a site out of it. Just to see what I can do with my measley coding skills.

item.title: Some Updates
item.description: In case you hadn’t noticed I’ve been a bit busy here recently. Not only has the entire site been redone but it’s still not complete. While it is complete enough to get going with new content. Here is what I’ve done. - Now made with Hugo! I went back to Hugo because I like the simplicity of it and how I can make changes right on my laptop during the week.
